title.narrative: 3. Advocacy and Media campaign / partnership network_ 3.2 Mobilization

description.narrative:
Mobilize the public, change perceptions, and build support to influence decision-makers and stakeholders around legal women’s rights regarding marriage and Gender based Violence through the design and implementation of mass media.
Work to produce the 5 stories of women GBV survivors commenced in October 2020 and stories were documented and filmed. Two stories were shared during the 16 Days of Activism against Gender-Based Violence activities, from 25 November to 10 December. The 3 stories will be shared during January 2021. Success Stories annexed

receiver-org.narrative: King Hussein Foundation;Their mission is to build upon King Hussein’s lifelong commitment to peace, sustainable community development and cross-cultural understanding through national and regional programs that promote education and leadership, economic empowerment and participatory decision-making.
